stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
If you run a Shopify store you probably have customers from all over the world.

The one problem with customers from different countries is that your store only shows prices in a single currency. This force many customers to take out a calculator find exchange rates and work out a price just to buy your products.

The unnecessary friction to making a purchase hinders your conversion rates. It's too much work.

Thankfully there is a solution a Shopify Currency Converter for your store.

Have over 64 different currencies available on your store to give customers an accurate price and help them make a purchase faster.

Customers can easily select the country of their choice and have the product prices convert to their local currency.

Don't hinder your international customers from purchasing get a Shopify Currency Converter today.

What can I expect?

  • Customize Shopify Pricing Settings
  • Adjust Shopify Template
  • Add currency switcher
  • Display currency switcher
title: Setup Shopify Currency Converter
